actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to Subcommittee on SBA, and the General Economy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA, and the General Economy

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to authorize the Small Business Administration to purchase equity securities of qualified small business concerns.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to authorize the Small Business Administration to purchase stock from qualified small business corporations. Prohibits the purchase of such stock if the total amount outstanding and committed (by participation or otherwise) to the corporation from the business loan and investment fund exceeds $750,000. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to authorize the Small Business Administration to purchase equity securities of qualified small business concerns.
